titles: A treatise of Melchisedek prouing him to be Sem, the father of all the sonnes of Heber, the fyrst king, and all kinges glory: by the generall consent of his owne sonnes, by the continuall iudgement of ages, and by plentifull argumentes of scripture.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
publisher: [By Richard Watkins] for Gabriel Simson and William White,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Melchizedek, --  King of Salem --  Early works to 1800.
Bible. --  O.T. --  Genesis --  Criticism, interpretation, etc.
